channel.title: Making npcs talk
channel.description:
in a deltascape source how would i make an npc talk.
Thanks for help.

item.title: Making npcs talk
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

well, i like delta because…well its just fun to me.

and can you at least tell me what to search for?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2009, 10:29:15 am[/size][hr]do i need to make a case with the npc ID then do sM(“message”)?

Read full topic

item.title: Making npcs talk
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

First of all, might I ask why you’re using Deltascape? It’s just rather amusing seeing 70% of this community asking questions about deltascape. So tell me, what made you choose delta?

Anyways, it’s in your client.java. I’m not telling you anymore because one, I don’t know much about it (I promised myself to keep it that way), and two you haven’t seemed to try to figure it out yourself. This is a non-spoon-fed community. You’re going to have to show us an attempt at it before asking for help.

Read full topic
